        public abstract java.nio.charset.Charset getDefaultCharset()
        Returns:
        charset configured in Settings|File Encodings|IDE encoding

      • getEncoding

        public abstract java.nio.charset.Charset getEncoding(VirtualFile virtualFile,
                                                     boolean useParentDefaults)
        Parameters:
        virtualFile - file to get encoding for
        useParentDefaults - true to determine encoding from the parent
        Returns:
        encoding configured for this file in Settings|File Encodings or, if useParentDefaults is true, encoding configured for nearest parent of virtualFile or, null if there is no configured encoding found.
